Title: Ink Flow
Description:
The project is for the learning of F# in application development: WPF, SharpGL, Asynchronous. 
The software is for creating art with realistic ink dynamics.
HomeWiki:
The project is for the learning of F# in application development: WPF, SharpGL, Asynchronous.
The software is for creating art with realistic ink dynamics.

This is a small program I am building for fun to learn application programming with F#, wpf, sharpgl, and asynchronous programming. It runs like a paint program but its focus is ink with ink dynamics to model flow and eluent flow (ink separation).
